name: UsCoreSDOHProblemsHealthConcerns
title: US Core SDOH Problems and Health Concerns Profile
description: The US SDOH Core Problems and Health Concerns Profile is based upon the US Core SDOH Problems and Health Concerns Profile and meets the  U.S. Core Data for Interoperability (USCDI) v2 SDOH 'Problems/Health Concerns' requirements.  It defines constraints and extensions on the Condition resource for the minimal set of data to record, search, and fetch information about a Social Determinants of Health-related condition.
